body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Depot. My name is Ronald Young. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Kathleen Long.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathleen. Can you please provide your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, three nine zero, two two one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, and could you also confirm your address for shipping?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's four one zero Lakeview Drive, Springdale, seven one two zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for the information, Kathleen. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I'm feeling a bit nervous about the shipping, though.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Kathleen. Rest assured, we'll take care of everything. Thank you for reaching out, and have a wonderful day!
